title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 731/93 of 26 March 1993 concerning the classification of certain goods in the Combined Nomenclature
header:
30.3.1993 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 75/7
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 731/93
of 26 March 1993
concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The goods described in column 1 of the annexed table are now classified within the combined nomenclature under the appropriate CN code indicated in column 2 of the said table.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 March 1993.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2)  OJ No L 58, 11. 3. 1993, p. 50.
ANNEX
Description Classification CN code Reason
(1) (2) (3)
Annelida (Polychaetes), commonly known as segmented worms, found in marine shoreline habitats and generally known as ‘marine worms’, used as fishing bait 0106 00 99 The classification is determined by the provisions of general rules 1 and 6 on the interpretation of the combined nomenclature and by the wording of CN codes 0106, 0106 00 and 0106 00 90
